quiz.text: Which of the following statement is correct with respect to Swachhata Pakhwada - Swachhata Hi Seva (SHS) 2023 campaign?A) Theme of SHS-2023 has been ‘Garbage Free India’.B) The 3rd edition of India Swachhata League has been organised as a part of this campaign. C) Safai Mitra Suraksha Shivir under it aims to target all sanitation workers in Solid Waste Management (SWM) & Used Water Management (UWM) and their dependents with welfare schemes.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
A only
All of the above

quiz.text: Venue for this ministerial session was New Delhi, it was hosted by Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) and the theme was, ‘Global Champions for Advancing Clean Energy Innovation & Manufacturing’. Which of the following gathering matches above description?
options: 4th Energy Transitions Working Group Meeting
8th Mission Innovation meeting
14th Clean Energy Ministerial
4th International Conference & Exhibition on Clean Energy
None of the above

quiz.text: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEF&CC), recently celebrated the _______. This day is celebrated on 16th September each year to commemorate the signing of the Montreal Protocol in 1987.
options: International Day of Zero Waste
World Ozone Day
International Day for Biological Diversity
International Day of Clean Air for blue skies
World Migratory Bird Day

quiz.text: In a historic move, the Vice-President and Chairman of Rajya Sabha (RS) recently (Sep 2023) reconstituted all women panel of Vice-Chairpersons comprising ______ women RS Members.
options: 14
12
13
11
10

quiz.text: Recently the 4th G20 Global Partnership for Financial Inclusion (GPFI) Meeting concluded in Mumbai. The discussions contributed towards the culmination of the remaining work of the ongoing ________ which is in its terminal year.
options: Financial Inclusion Action Plan 2019
Financial Inclusion Action Plan 2020
Financial Inclusion Action Plan 2021
Financial Inclusion Action Plan 2022
None of the above

quiz.text: With respect to recently concluded meeting of the G20 Framework Working Group (FWG), under the Indian G20 Presidency, identify incorrect statement.
options: Venue of this meeting was Raipur.
This meeting was Co-chaired by India and the US.
It was the 4th and final meeting of the G20 FWG, under the Indian G20 Presidency.
Two G20 Reports- 1st on Macroeconomic Impacts of Food and Energy Insecurity and 2nd on on Macroeconomic Risks Stemming from Climate Change and Transition Pathways delivered.
All of the above

quiz.text: President of India recently inaugurated Annual General Meeting and Biennial Conference of the Asia Pacific Forum on Human Rights. Membership of Asia Pacific Forum on Human Rights includes ______ National Human Rights Institutions (NHRIs) from Asia Pacific.
options: 56
46
36
26
16

quiz.text: With respect to recently concluded meeting of the G20 Infrastructure Working Group (IWG), under the Indian G20 Presidency, identify the correct statement.
options: It was hosted and chaired by the The Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs.
Venue of this meeting was New Delhi.
Australia and Brazil were co-chairs during the meeting.
It was the 5th and final meeting of the G20 IWG, under the Indian G20 Presidency.
None of the above.

quiz.text: Recently the final meeting of the G20 Sustainable Finance Group, under the Indian G20 Presidency concluded in ________.
options: Mumbai
Jaipur
New Delhi
Gandhi Nagar
Varanasi

quiz.text: The National Medical Commission (NMC) has been granted the World Federation for Medical Education (WFME) Recognition Status recently (Sep 2023). Identify correct statement with respect to it-A) Status has been granted for a remarkable tenure of 20 years. B) All the 706 existing medical colleges in India will become WFME accredited and new ones that will be set up in the coming 10 years will automatically accredited. C) WFME headquarter is in Copenhagen, Denmark.
options: A and B only
B and C only
A only
B only
All of the above

quiz.text: The Central Public Sector Enterprise (CPSE), _______ and its subsidiaries contributed with Rs. 23,363 Crore as on 14 September 2023 which is 17% more than its actual target for FY’ 2023-24.  With this it has become the leading CPSE in the country in Government e Marketplace (GeM) procurement.
options: BHARAT HEAVY ELECTRICALS LTD.
DEDICATED FREIGHT CORRIDOR CORP.OF INDIA LTD.
GAIL (INDIA) LTD.
HINDUSTAN FERTILIZER CORP.LTD.
COAL INDIA LTD.

quiz.text: Identify correct statement with respect to recently released report, titled “Elephant Corridors of India”-
options: Union Environment Ministry’s Project Elephant, State forest departments and technical teams from the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) collaborated for this report.
India has 150 elephant corridors spanning 15 range-states in 4 elephant-bearing regions.
Karnataka topping the list with 26 such land strips, accounting for over 17% of the total such land patches in the country.
Among the four regions, the Southern region reported the highest number of elephant corridors at 52.
126 are within the political boundaries of states while 19 are located across two states and 6 transnational corridors between India and Bangladesh.

quiz.text: The ________ organised as part of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) concluded recently at UN Headquarters, New York. Major polluters collectively responsible for 42% of global greenhouse gas emissions were notably missing from this critical event.
options: UN Climate Change Conference
Sustainable Climate Summit
Climate Action Summit
Climate Ambition Summit
Sustainable Climate Action Conference

quiz.text: The Union Ministry of Home Affairs has recently (Sep 2023) unveiled modification in the utilization of birth certificates for essential services. Under it Birth Certificates won’t be necessary document for which of the following?
options: Admission to Educational Institutions
Driving License
Preparation Aadhaar Number
Marriage Registration
None of the above

quiz.text: Identify correct statement with respect to recently (Sep 2023) passed Nari Shakti Vandan Adhiniyam-
options: The Bill reserves 33% of all seats for women in Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha.
The Bill reserves 33% of all seats for women in state legislative assemblies and state legislative Councils.
33% of the total number of seats reserved for SCs and Sts and OBCs shall be reserved for women of those groups.
The reservation will be provided for a period of 15 years.
The reservation of seats will be effective from 2024 General elections.

quiz.text: Recently at the 12th India-UK Economic and Financial Dialogue (EFD) held in New Delhi, two countries announced the India-UK Infrastructure Finance Bridge. It will be collaboration between ________ and City of London Corporation.
options: India Infrastructure Finance Company Ltd
Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Niti Aayog
None of the above

quiz.text: India recently (Sep 2023) hosted the inaugural United Nations Commission on International Trade Law (UNCITRAL) South Asia conference. Identify correct statement with respect to it-A) It was organised jointly by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry and UNCITRAL.B) It was held in Gandhi Nagar, Gujarat.C) UNCITRAL acts as core legal body of the UN system in the field of international trade law.D) UNCITRAL is composed of 70 Member States elected by the UN General Assembly (UNGA).
options: A and B only
B and C only
A and C only
C and D only
A and D only

quiz.text: The G77+China Summit, recently attended by over 100 nations and 30 heads of state, concluded with a focus on empowering the Global South in international governance. Identify correct statement with respect to it-
options: It was held in Beijing, China.
India and China are the founding members of this grouping.
India was represented by its President at this summit.
Key development at the summit was the declaration by developing countries of September 16 as the annual “Day of Science, Technology, and Innovation in the South.”
All of the above

quiz.text: The Odisha government has recently launched Rs ______ startup fund in collaboration with Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI). The fund will invest in startups of Odisha over ______ through Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs).
options: Rs 500 crore, 10 years
Rs 400 crore, 10 years
Rs 300 crore, 5 years
Rs 200 crore, 5 years
Rs 100 crore, 5 years

quiz.text: Identify correct statement with respect to recent OECD Economic Outlook, Interim Report September 2023.A) It has raised India’s GDP growth projection for FY 2024 to 6.3%, up from the previous of 6%.B) It estimates that global GDP growth is to slow to 3.0% in 2023.C) A stronger than expected Chinese economy is helping to keep a global slowdown in check this year but a weakening U.S. economy will prove to be a bigger drag next year.
options: A and B only
B and C only
A and C only
B only
C only

quiz.text: Which of the following statements are correct regarding BIS Standard Clubs?a) The initiative was launched to sensitize young members of society about the importance of standards in improving quality of life.b) High and higher secondary eligible Government Schools with Standards Clubs are entitled to receive a one-time Laboratory Grant to a maximum of Rs. 50,000/- to upgrade scientific labsc) Financial assistance of upto Rs. 1,00,000/- will be provided to establish 'Manak Kaksha' in government institutions where Standards Clubs have been formed.
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b
All the three statements are correct

quiz.text: The first batch of 8 Cheetah’s were translocated from which of the following countries to the Kuno National Park under Project Cheetah?
options: Namibia
South Africa
Kenya
Tanzania
Botswana

quiz.text: Under Project Cheetah, Cheetah Action Plan was unveiled to assess the short term success of the project using six criteria, out of which four have been met already. Which of the following are among the four criteria that have been met already?a) 50% survival of introduced cheetahsb) establishment of home rangesc) survival of wild-born cheetah cubs past one year
options: both a and b
both a and c
only a
only b
only c

quiz.text: The Ministry of Women and Child Development is celebrating the 6th Rashtriya Poshan Maah throughout September 2023. Which of the following is not a sub-theme of 6th Rashtriya Poshan Maah?
options: Exclusive Breastfeeding and Complementary Feeding
Swasth Balak Spardha
Improving Nutrition through Mission LiFE
Bacha aur Shiksha
Tribal-Focused Nutrition Sensitization

quiz.text: Identify the correct statement(s) regarding Pradhan Mantri Tuberculosis (TB) Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan?a) It was launched in 2022b) The initiative intends to augment community involvement in meeting India’s commitment to end TB by 2030c) The minimum period to provide additional support to a TB period shall be one year
options: only a
only b
both a and c
both a and b
only c

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), India marked one year of launch of National Logistics Policy. One of the targets of the National Logistics Policy is improve the Logistics Performance Index ranking i.e to be among top 25 countries by 2030. Logistics Performance Index is released by which of the following organizations?
options: UNIDO
WEF
World Bank
IMF
UNDP

quiz.text: Recently (September 2023), National Mission on Cultural Mapping (NMCM) of Indira Gandhi National Centre for the Arts (IGNCA) has organized the fourth 'Nadi Utsav'. The host city of fourth Nadi Utsav is situated on the banks of which of the following rivers?
options: Yamuna
Ganga
Krishna
Godavari
Narmada

quiz.text: According to the recent data released by the Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT), Maharashtra ranked first in attracting Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) during the first quarter of FY 2023-24. Which of the following states/UTs secured the third spot during the mentioned period?
options: Delhi
Gujarat
Tamil Nadu
Karnataka
Telangana

quiz.text: Recently, a Digital India Talk Show cum Interactive Session was organized as a part of Digital India Awareness campaign by the National e-Governance Division (NeGD), Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) at Delhi University. During the session five key Digital India initiatives were discussed, Which of the following is not among one of the five key initiatives of Digital India?
options: UMANG
DigiLocker
National Career Service (NCS)
National Academic Depository – Academic Bank of Credits (NAD-ABC)
myScheme and UX4G
